actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of titles 18 and 28 that are commonly called the Rules Enabling Acts to provide a uniform method for the proposal and adoption of certain rules of court by the Judicial Conference.

summary.text: Rules Enabling Act Amendments Act - Amends the Rules Enabling Acts to empower the Judicial Conference of the United States rather than the Supreme Court to prescribe, contingent upon Congressional approval, rules of pleading, practice, and procedure for Federal courts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of titles 18 and 28 that are commonly called the Rules Enabling Acts to provide a uniform method for the proposal and adoption of certain rules of court by the Judicial Conference.
